title: [Self-Directed] U-Learning-Based Mobile Microlearning Course for Fitness English Reading Comprehension

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English reading comprehension and understanding of fitness terminology
context.additional_context: Context-based learning environment utilizing QR code scanning linked to actual gym equipment

learning_goals: Learners can comprehend fitness-related English texts (e.g., exercise equipment manuals, program guides) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can utilize real-time fitness English content, delivered via mobile devices and QR code recognition, with over 80% proficiency.
Learners can independently create English reading materials tailored to real-world exercise scenarios at least once through project-based assessments.

resources: QR code generation/recognition software for smartphones
Fitness English reading digital content (equipment guides, workout routines, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
